summary: A Nord barbarian follower at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Kolmar is a Nord barbarian at the Bannered Mare inn in Whiterun. He's always ready for an adventure, so no quests or fees are needed to hire him. He will level with the player from 5 to maximum and can be married.

His default outfit is bandit furs, a circlet, and an Amulet of Talos. His starting weapon is a steel greatsword. He also carries a few random items, a small amount of food and drink, and about 20-50 gold. His NPC class is [i]CombatBarbarian[/i], and he prefers light armor and two-handed weapons. He is essential (so you can't kill him) and has a standard Nord male voice.

This mod has been cleaned with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url].

If you find any bugs or incompatibilities, please let me know in the comments!

Kolmar is also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130456592]Steam Workshop[/url].

[b]-- Instructions --[/b]

Use the [i]Download with manager[/i] button, and install with your mod manager of choice.

Or download the zip manually, then unzip the files to your [i]...\skyrim\Data\[/i] folder.

[b]-- Recommended mods --[/b]

[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16167][b]Barbarian Loincloths[/b][/url] -- In my game, I usually give Kolmar the Fur Loincloth from this mod.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6684][b]Lore Friendly Armor Pack[/b][/url], or its (much larger) successor, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733][b]Immersive Armors[/b][/url] -- I often use the Barbarian Armor set from these. The Barbarian Boots and Gauntlets go well with the Fur Loincloth mentioned above. [*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092][b]Cloaks of Skyrim[/b][/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486][b]Winter Is Coming[/b][/url] -- Both add craftable cloaks, some of which look properly barbaric with the above.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5624][b]Greatsword sheaths and scabbards[/b][/url] -- Adds scabbards to many two-handed swords. [/list]

 
[b]-- Changelog --[/b]

See [i]Changes[/i] tab above.

[b]-- Notes --[/b]

This mod's filenames are:
[list]
[*][i]aom_barbarianfollower.esp[/i]
[*][i]meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\aom_barbarianfollower.esp\00000D62.nif[/i]
[*][i]textures\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceTint\aom_barbarianfollower.esp\00000D62.dds[/i] [/list]  
Kolmar's base info in the Creation Kit is under [i]Actors → Actor → AoMKolmarBarbarianFollower[/i].

Kolmar's BaseID is [i]xx000D62[/i] and his RefID is [i]xx001D8D[/i]. (Replace [i]xx[/i] with whatever number this mod gets in your game; type [i]help kolmar[/i] in the console to find it.)
author: Aaron of Minneapolis

files.changelogHtml:
Kolmar is now friends with Vorstag (in Markarth) and an aquaintance of Uthgerd the Unbroken (in Whiterun). Vorstag should show up at the wedding on Kolmar's side if the player marries Kolmar, and vice versa. (2013-03-12)
Initial Nexus upload. (2013-07-13)
